title: Sweet Little Devil
description:
A collection of stories by Nanzaki Iku (better known by the circle name Doropanda Tours), mostly from Yuri Hime Wildrose.

1. Sweet Little Devil : two childhood friends who are now in a relationship.
2. Heart and Soul: a sequel to "Sweet Little Devil," Ritsuko and Sayo deal with their insecurities about Ritsuko's upcoming graduation.
3. Moment Like Fireworks
4. Love Prep Room: two girls have the art prep room all to themselves
5. Our Future Plans: Azumi worries that her girlfriend Shiki, a dog groomer who's a few years older than her, doesn't really love her.
6. Starting Over
7. One and Only: gives us a glimpse of Ritsuko and Sayo's future after graduation

Extras:
In "Girls Don't Cry," Ritsuko gets a shock--one of her friends thinks Sayo is cool!
"Another Sweet Field" is about how Sayo wants to be Ritsuko's bride when they grow up.
